innerAbility.name: 2nd & 3rd Line Options
abilities: Meso / Cooldown / Boss Dmg (if not 1st Line)

attackStats.name: LUK
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/nimble-body.png} tip={Nimble Body (1st Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/agile-daggers.png} tip={Agile Daggers (2nd Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training (2nd Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/blood-money.png} tip={Blood Money (4th Job)} val={+10}> <bg type={def} sub={opt} src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior (4th Job)} val={+15% to assigned AP} subSrc={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} subTip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} subVal={extra +400%}>

attackStats.name: Attack
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/heros-echo.png} tip={Hero's Echo (Beginner Skill)} val={+4%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/channel-karma.png} tip={Channel Karma (2nd Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/shield-mastery.png} tip={Shield Mastery (2nd Job)} val={+15}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/meso-mastery.png} tip={Meso Mastery (3rd Job)} val={+25}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/shadower-instinct.png} tip={Shadower Instinct (4th Job)} val={+50}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/dagger-expert.png} tip={Dagger Expert (4th Job)} val={+40}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/steal.png} tip={Steal (2nd Job)} val={+30}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/last-resort.png} tip={Last Resort (5th Job)} val={+30}>

attackStats.name: Crit Rate
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +5%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/critical-edge.png} tip={Critical Edge (2nd Job)} val={+25%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/flip-of-the-coin.png} tip={Flip of the Coin (Hyper Skill)} val={+5% per successful critical attack} val={(Max. +25%)}>

attackStats.name: Crit Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/critical-edge.png} tip={Critical Edge (2nd Job)} val={+5%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/blood-money.png} tip={Blood Money (4th Job)} val={+20%}> <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/dagger-expert.png} tip={Dagger Expert (4th Job)} val={+15%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/smokescreen.png} tip={Smokescreen (4th Job)} val={+20% to enemies within zone}>

attackStats.name: Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/flip-of-the-coin.png} tip={Flip of the Coin (Hyper Skill)} val={+5% per successful critical attack} val={(Max. +25%)}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/epic-adventure.png} tip={Epic Adventure (Hyper Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/link-skills/thiefs-cunning.png} tip={Thief's Cunning (Link Skill)} val={+18% upon debuffing enemy}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.name: Final Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/dagger-expert.png} tip={Dagger Expert (4th Job)} val={+10%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/cruel-stab.png} tip={Cruel Stab (4th Job)} val={+25%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/shadower-instinct.png} tip={Shadower Instinct (4th Job)} val={+15%}> × <bg type={temp} sub={opt} src={/class-icons/common/advanced-dark-sight.png} tip={Advanced Dark Sight (3rd Job)} val={+15% while in Dark Sight} subSrc={/class-icons/5th-job/shadow-walker.png} subTip={Shadow Walker (5th Job)} subVal={extra +14% while active}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/last-resort.png} tip={Last Resort (5th Job)} val={+13% in Stage 1} val={+30% in Stage 2}>

buffInfo.toggles: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/steal.png} tip={Steal (2nd Job)}> [<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/pick-pocket.png} tip={Pick Pocket (3rd Job)}> / <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/blood-money.png} tip={Blood Money (4th Job)}>] <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/flip-of-the-coin.png} tip={Flip of the Coin (Hyper Skill)}>

buffInfo.buffCd: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/epic-adventure.png} tip={Epic Adventure (Hyper Skill)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/last-resort.png} tip={Last Resort (5th Job)} dur={[30s](75s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/shadow-walker.png} tip={Shadow Walker (5th Job)} dur={[30s](180s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-echo.png} tip={Hero's Echo (Beginner Skill)} dur={[2400s](300s cd)}>
buffInfo.iFrame: <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)} dur={[200s](Special, 0 - 15s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/trickblade.png} tip={Trickblade (5th Job)} dur={[1.8s](20s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/halve-cut.png} tip={Halve Cut (6th Job)} dur={[360s cd]}>

details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Thief to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the town Lith Harbor where Sugar has a quest called 'The Adventure Begins'. Accept the quest and choose the option 'Thief' when prompted

Continue with the story until Lv. 30 as a Thief and talk to Dark Lord to accept a quest called 'The 2 Paths of the Thief'. Complete the quest by choosing the option Bandit and you will be on the path to a Shadower. Bandit is the 2nd job of Shadower

build: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/flash-jump.png} tip={Flash Jump}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/nimble-body.png} tip={Nimble Body}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/haste.png} tip={Haste}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/double-stab.png} tip={Double Stab}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/lucky-seven.png} tip={Lucky Seven}>

<tt src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/dagger-mastery.png} tip={Dagger Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/agile-daggers.png} tip={Agile Daggers}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/critical-edge.png} tip={Critical Edge}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/shield-mastery.png} tip={Shield Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/channel-karma.png} tip={Channel Karma}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/savage-blow.png} tip={Savage Blow}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/steal.png} tip={Steal}>

<tt src={/class-icons/common/enveloping-darkness.png} tip={Enveloping Darkness}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/meso-mastery.png} tip={Meso Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/pick-pocket.png} tip={Pick Pocket}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/venom.png} tip={Venom}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/shadow-partner.png} tip={Shadow Partner}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/dark-flare.png} tip={Dark Flare}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/meso-explosion.png} tip={Meso Explosion}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/phase-dash.png} tip={Phase Dash}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/midnight-carnival.png} tip={Midnight Carnival}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/toxic-venom.png} tip={Toxic Venom}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/shadower-instinct.png} tip={Shadower Instinct}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/dagger-expert.png} tip={Dagger Expert}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/cruel-stab.png} tip={Cruel Stab}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/blood-money.png} tip={Blood Money}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/shadow-shifter.png} tip={Shadow Shifter}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/sudden-raid.png} tip={Sudden Raid}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/assassinate.png} tip={Assassinate}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/smokescreen.png} tip={Smokescreen}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/meso-explosion-reinforce.png} tip={Meso Explosion - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/meso-explosion-enhance.png} tip={Meso Explosion - Enhance}> Meso Explosion - Reinforce and Enhance_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/assassinate-reinforce.png} tip={Assassinate - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/assassinate-boss-rush.png} tip={Assassinate - Boss Rush}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/assassinate-guardbreak.png} tip={Assassinate - Guardbreak}> Assassinate - Reinforce, Boss Rush, and Guardbreak_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/assassinate.png} tip={Assassinate (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/shadow-veil.png} tip={Shadow Veil (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/meso-explosion.png} tip={Meso Explosion (3rd Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/sudden-raid.png} tip={Sudden Raid (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/dark-flare.png} tip={Dark Flare (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/cruel-stab.png} tip={Cruel Stab (4th Job)}>
notes: Either categories can be maxed first based on if you prioritize bossing or mobbing
Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category so that the skills boosted match your priorities
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/savage-blow.png} tip={Savage Blow (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/phase-dash.png} tip={Phase Dash (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/meso-explosion.png} tip={Meso Explosion (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/midnight-carnival.png} tip={Midnight Carnival (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/dark-flare.png} tip={Dark Flare (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/assassinate.png} tip={Assassinate (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/cruel-stab.png} tip={Cruel Stab (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/sudden-raid.png} tip={Sudden Raid (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/shadow-veil.png} tip={Shadow Veil (Hyper Skill)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Poro and the members of the Shadower Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Boost Nodes Build + Hyper Passive Build

extraContent.title: Dark Sight
content: <em text={Credits to the Night Walker Discord for the list of attacks avoidable with Dark Sight. For an actively maintained version, please check out the Night Walker Discord}>

In 1st Job, <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}> Dark Sight is unlocked that allows you to dodge certain attacks. Below is a list of avoidable attacks that have been tested:

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/77/An_Arrangement_from_the_Goddess%2E} title={"An Arrangement from the Goddess"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Double Stab
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 165%, Number of Attacks: 2, Enemies Hit: 5
primary.desc: Stab inplace damaging enemies around you
details: Only usable when equipped with a Dagger

primary.name: Lucky Seven
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Throwing Star Cost: 2, Damage: 110%, Enemies Hit: 5, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Throws a barrage of stars forward
details: Only usable when equipped with a Claw

primary.name: Haste
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +40, Jump: +20, Max Speed: +20

primary.name: Dark Sight
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, hides in the shadows for 200 seconds.\nWhen Dark Sight is deactivated, cooldown increased per attack dodged: 3 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.
primary.desc: While active, you cannot hit or be hit by enemies
details: While active, pressing the Skill Key again or using an attack will cancel Dark Sight
You can use <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/thief/flash-jump.png} tip={Flash Jump (1st Job)}> while in Dark Sight
Has a cooldown (3 secs, stacks up to 5 times) per attack dodged

primary.name: Flash Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, jumps further, able to use 2 times consecutively.
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
Can be used twice in a row

primary.name: Nimble Body
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases LUK by 20

primary.name: Savage Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, attack 6 enemies with 210% damage 3 times.
primary.desc: Slashes forward several times

primary.name: Critical Edge
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +25%, Critical Damage: +5%

primary.name: Steal
primary.shortDesc: Grants attack skills a 10% chance to steal a potion that instantly restores HP or MP. Consuming a potion that was stolen from a boss fully restores both HP and MP, and grants you a buff that increases your Attack Power by 30 for 3 minutes.
primary.desc: While toggled, grants your attack skills a chance to restore HP or MP
details: If the effect was triggered on a boss, you recover both HP and MP plus you gain a flat Attack buff
Can only trigger this effect once per enemy

primary.name: Agile Daggers
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, Luck: +20

primary.name: Channel Karma
primary.shortDesc: Attack +30, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Dagger Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Dagger Mastery: +50%, Final Damage: +10%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases LUK by 30 and DEX by 30

primary.name: Shield Mastery
primary.shortDesc: When shield or dagger scabbard is equipped, DEF: +110%, Avoidability: +20%, Attack Power: +15, Damage Taken: -60%

primary.name: Bandit's Agility
primary.shortDesc: Allows you to Flash Jump upwards
primary.desc: Up jump skill
details: Can be activated in the air while pressing the Up Arrow Key and Jump Key together

primary.name: Midnight Carnival
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 26, attack 8 enemies with 190% damage 4 times
primary.desc: Releases a barrage of slashes forward

primary.name: Phase Dash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, attack 8 enemies with 420% damage 2 times
primary.desc: Dashes forward while pushing back enemies

primary.name: Meso Explosion
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 100% and Number of Attacks: 2 per Meso per enemy, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Max Number of Projectiles: 15
primary.desc: Causes Mesos dropped by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/pick-pocket.png} tip={Pick Pocket (3rd Job)}> to seek out and damage nearby enemies

primary.name: Dark Flare
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, summon a dagger, for 60 sec., that periodically deals 360% damage to 3 enemies nearby. Cooldown: 60 sec.
primary.desc: Creates a damaging field
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Pick Pocket
primary.shortDesc: Has a 30% chance to drop Mesos, up to a maximum of 15 Mesos.\nMesos do not drop from Venom or Sudden Raid, which do damage over time.
primary.desc: While toggled, attacks have a chance to drop Mesos which are used by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/meso-explosion.png} tip={Meso Explosion (3rd Job)}>
details: Mesos do not drop from summoning skills, 5th Job Common Skills, damage over time, and <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/meso-explosion.png} tip={Meso Explosion (3rd Job)}>
Cannot be used at the same time as <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/blood-money.png} tip={Blood Money (4th Job)}>

primary.name: Shadow Partner
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 64, summons a shadow that makes an additional hit that is 70% of the final damage for all attacks for 200 sec.
primary.desc: Creates a clone that mimics your attacks, increasing the number of hits you deal per attack
details: The clone's attack deals reduced %Final Damage
Does not mimic <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/meso-explosion.png} tip={Meso Explosion (3rd Job)}>, summoning skills, and 5th Job Common Skills

primary.name: Advanced Dark Sight
primary.shortDesc: 15% chance to maintain Dark Sight on attacking. When inside your own Smokescreen or Shadow Veil, this increases to 100%.\n15% chance to auto-trigger Dark Sight, Final Damage +15% when attacking during Dark Sight.\nIf you dodge an attack that deals damage proportional to Max HP, using the Dark Sight that activates when you are hit, the Dark Sight's remaining time will be reduced by 20% of its maximum.
primary.desc: During <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}>, using attacks has a chance to not deactivate the buff. Additionally, when you are hit, there is a chance to automatically activate <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}>
details: While in the automatic <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}>, if you dodge an attack that deals %Max HP, the duration is reduced slightly and the cooldown will not apply
Additionally, you gain increased %Final Damage while in <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Into Darkness
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20. Teleport to an enemy within range and go into Dark Sight. Cooldown shared with Dark Sight.
primary.desc: Teleport to an enemy within range and activates <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}>
details: Shares cooldown with <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Venom
primary.shortDesc: Status Chance: 30%, Damage Over Time: 90% damage every 1 sec for 6 sec
primary.desc: Grants a chance for your attacks to apply a poisoning debuff

primary.name: Meso Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +25, Enemy Meso Drop Rate: +20%\nMeso Explosion Damage (per shot): +20%p

primary.name: Enveloping Darkness
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%

primary.name: Assassinate
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 44, Damage: 270%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 6, Press the skill key once more to deal 490% damage 6 times as the final blow.\nFinal Damage increases by 50% when using a final blow that consumes the Murderous Intent buff.
primary.desc: Strikes an enemy several times before unleashing a devastating attack
details: Assassinate has two attacks, the initial strike and pressing the Skill Key again will activate the final blow
While casting, you are immune to being knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
Final blow deals increased %Final Damage when <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/blood-money.png} tip={Blood Money (4th Job)}> Murderous Intent is active and consumes the buff

primary.name: Cruel Stab
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Damage: 250%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 6\n[Passive Effect: Final Damage: +25%]
primary.desc: Stab forward
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Final Damage
Has a reduced chance to drop Mesos from <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/pick-pocket.png} tip={Pick Pocket (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Blood Money
primary.shortDesc:
Your attacks have a 30% chance of dropping coins. A total of 15 coins can be in play at any one time.
Damage-over-time effects from Venom and Sudden Raid do not generate coins.
Casting Meso Explosion while Blood Money is active grants the Muderous Intent buff. Meso Explosion deals 30% additional damage against bosses.
[Passive Effects] Luck +10, Critical Damage: +20%.
primary.desc: While toggled, your attacks have a chance to drop red coins which are used by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/meso-explosion.png} tip={Meso Explosion (3rd Job)}>
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Crit Damage and grants flat LUK

While active, <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/meso-explosion.png} tip={Meso Explosion (3rd Job)}> grants the Murderous Intent buff and deals increased %Boss Damage<bp_Targets bosses first with the highest HP_>
Coins do not drop from summoning skills, 5th Job Common Skills, damage over time, and <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/meso-explosion.png} tip={Meso Explosion (3rd Job)}>
Cannot be used at the same time as <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/pick-pocket.png} tip={Pick Pocket (3rd Job)}>
Right-clicking the skill will toggle the visual effect ON/OFF

Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Sudden Raid
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 290, Damage: 494%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 7, Damage Over Time: 210% damage every 1 sec for 10 sec, Cooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Unleashes a devastating large attack that applies a damaging debuff
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Smokescreen
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 46, Critical Damage within the Smokescreen: +20%, Damage Taken in Proportion to Max HP: -10%,\nDuration: 30 sec, Cooldown: 150 sec
primary.desc: Creates a smokescreen where party members cannot be hit by enemy attacks
details: <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}> will not deactivate while attacking within the smokescreen
Increased chance for <tt src={/class-icons/common/advanced-dark-sight.png} tip={Advanced Dark Sight (3rd Job)}> to activate while within the smokescreen
For attacks that deal %Max HP damage, the damage will be reduced<bp_Smokescreen can also block certain key boss attacks such as Lotus' lightning floor & purple orbs and Will's screen crack_>
Enemies within the smokescreen take increased %Crit Damage
While casting, you are immune to being knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Shadower Instinct
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +50, Final Damage: +15%, Ignore DEF: +20%

primary.name: Shadow Shifter
primary.shortDesc: Dodge Chance: 45%, Knockback Resistance: +60%

primary.name: Toxic Venom
primary.shortDesc: Poison Chance: 50%, 160% damage every 1 sec for 8 sec, can be stacked 3 times
details: Increases debuff chance, duration, and %Damage
Can now be stacked (up to 3 times)

primary.name: Dagger Expert
primary.shortDesc: Dagger Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +40, Critical Damage: +15%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

hyperPassive.name: Meso Explosion - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Max number of usable Mesos dropped from Pick Pocket and Blood Money: 5. Chance for Mesos to drop from Pick Pocket and Blood Money: +10%.

hyperActive.name: Flip of the Coin
hyperActive.shortDesc: When you land a critical attack, obtain a buff with Damage: +5%, Critical Rate: +5%. Max Stacks: 5.
hyperActive.desc: While active, whenever you land a Critical Hit, gain a stacking buff of %Damage and %Crit Rate (up to 5 times)

hyperActive.name: Shadow Veil
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 800%, Duration: 12 sec.\nCooldown: 60 sec
hyperActive.desc: Creates a large damaging field of slashing blades
details: <tt src={/class-icons/common/dark-sight.png} tip={Dark Sight (1st Job)}> will not deactivate while attacking within the veil
Increased chance for <tt src={/class-icons/common/advanced-dark-sight.png} tip={Advanced Dark Sight (3rd Job)}> to activate while within the veil

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Explorer class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Shadow Assault
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Rush Damage: 1220%, Number of Attacks: 6, Critical Rate: +25%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +100%\nAttacks up to 4 times in the direction of your choice\nCan be used 2-4 times, with a 60 sec cooldown that starts after the first hit
fifthMain.desc: Dashes towards a chosen direction while damaging enemies in your path
details: Attack has increased %Crit Rate and 100% Ignore DEF
Pressing the desired Arrow Keys along with the Skill Key will dash towards that direction, including diagonal directions

Can be used up to 4 times and the cooldown starts after the initial cast<bp_If the skill is off cooldown and is casted again before all the charges are used, you regain maximum charges and the cooldown is applied again_>

fifthMain.name: Trickblade
fifthMain.shortDesc: Passive Effect: The last enemy hit with Assassinate's last attack and Sonic Blow receives a wound debuff, for 10 sec., that can stack up to 3 times. Only 1 enemy can receive the wound debuff. If the debuff is given to a new enemy, the previous debuff disappears.\nActive Effect - MP Cost: 650. Summons your hidden friends to deal 1485% damage up to 10 enemies 5 times. Cooldown: 14 sec.\nIf one of the enemies has the wound debuff at max stack, you can use it by linking from Assassinate and Sonic Blow to move behind that enemy and activate Chase Cut 5 times dealing 1815% damage 7 times with Critical Rate +100% and ignoring 100% additional Defense. Invincible for 1.8 sec after the attack, which also applies 20 sec. of cooldown.
details: [Passive]: Enemies hit by the final attack of <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/assassinate.png} tip={Assassinate (4th Job)}> or <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/sonic-blow.png} tip={Sonic Blow (5th Job)}> receive a stacking debuff (up to 3 times) that is consumed by Trick Blade<bp_Only 1 enemy can receive the debuff at a time_>

If an enemy has the debuff at max stack, you can link <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/assassinate.png} tip={Assassinate (4th Job)}> or <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/sonic-blow.png} tip={Sonic Blow (5th Job)}> together with Trick Blade to dash behind that enemy and deal a devastating attack<bp_The attack instead deals heavy damage to that one target and gains 100% Crit Rate and 100% Ignore DEF_You are also briefly invincible after the attack however the skill has a longer cooldown_Unaffected by Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect_>

fifthMain.name: Sonic Blow
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 2.5 sec, Damage: 1000% damage, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 7, Ignore DEF: +100%
Every attack of Sonic Blow stacks 3 wound debuffs on the highest Max HP enemy that was hit.
Cooldown: 45 sec.
Attack can be canceled by using Trickblade if there is an enemy with max wound stacks. Reduces cooldown by 2.5 sec. for every remaining number of attacks.
fifthMain.desc: Unleashes a barrage of slashes in front of you
details: Attack has 100% Ignore DEF and applies wound debuff from <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/trickblade.png} tip={Skill Trickblade (5th Job)}> to the enemy with the highest Max HP

Attack can be cancelled by using <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/shadow-assault.png} tip={Shadow Assault (5th Job)}> or <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/trickblade.png} tip={Trickblade (5th Job)}><bp_Cooldown will be reduced based on how many number of attacks remain_>
While casting, you are immune to being knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

fifthMain.name: Slash Shadow Formation
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1200, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 1265%, Number of Attacks: 8. Allies appear 12 times then the leader appears. Additional DEF Ignored: 100%\nLeader: Chase Cut Activation: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1870%, Number of Attacks: 15\nCooldown: 90 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Over a few seconds, shadows appear and slashes through enemies around you before dealing a devastating final blow
details: Attack has 100% Ignore DEF

When used with <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/assassinate.png} tip={Assassinate (4th Job)}> or <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/cruel-stab.png} tip={Cruel Stab (4th Job)}>, there is no casting animation and can be used at the same time
While active, pressing the Skill Key again will end the attack early and deal the devastating final blow
Unaffected by Damage Reflect and <tt src={/class-icons/common/shadow-partner.png} tip={Shadow Partner (3rd Job)}>

[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/assassinate.png} tip={Assassinate (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Assassinate
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 57, Damage: 395%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 6, Press the skill key once more to deal 690% damage 6 times as the final blow.\nFinal Damage increases by 50% when using a final blow that consumes the Murderous Intent buff.\nEnhances to HEXA Pulverize every 10 sec.
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Pulverize
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 57, Damage: 480%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 6, Press the skill key once more to deal 835% damage 6 times as the final blow.
Final Damage increases by 50% when using a final blow that consumes the Murderous Intent buff.
Upon use, Dark Sight Duration: 6 sec
Cooldown: 10 sec
Using Shadow Veil increases the number of uses by 2, using Smokescreen increases the number of uses by 3, maintaining for 3 sec within Smokescreen charges the number of uses by 1, Max Number of Charges: 5
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/shadower/meso-explosion.png} tip={Meso Explosion (3rd Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Meso Explosion
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Damage: 300% and Number of Attacks: 2 per Meso per enemy\nMax Enemies Hit: 10, Max Number of Projectiles: 15
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Meso Explosion
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 35, Damage: 300% and Number of Attacks: 2 per Meso per enemy
Max Enemies Hit: 10, Max Number of Projectiles: 15
Boss Damage: +40%
Grants the Murderous Intent buff.
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Halve Cut
originSkill.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting\nMax Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 960%, Number of Attacks: 6, Chase Cuts: 23. Damage: 782%, Number of Attacks: 6, Chase Cuts: 32. Damage: 850%, Number of Attacks: 7, Finishing Blows: 55\nCooldown: 360 sec

boostCore.name: Shadow Assault Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Shadow Assault Final Damage: +60%, Consecutive Uses: increased to 6, Cooldown: decreased to 50 sec

meta: Shadower is a LUK thief class part of the Explorers. Shadower utilize Daggers as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Dual Blade can equip Dagger Scabbards and Shields
